name: GAME & HELL
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME IS CALLED GAME & HELL BECAUSE IT IS VERY HARD. IT MAY EVEN BE CONSIDERED A RAGE GAME DUE TO EACH LEVEL REQUIRING TRIAL AND ERROR IN ORDER TO COMPLETE. AS SUCH, THIS GAME IS ONLY FOR EXPERIENCED GAMERS. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

GAME & HELL is a hard top-down horror game where you try to escape 10 long, windy mazes while collecting green coins. But beware, you are not alone! Monsters lurk the mazes of hell... run away from the likes of monsters such as The Bleeder, The Chaser, and The Cook in this twisted game. Can you survive this hell... or will it be GAME OVER?
